data.title: 'Diya Aur Baati Hum' meets 'Sasural Simar Ka 2': TV stars Pooja Singh and Karan Sharma to wed in March
data.meta_description: TV actors Pooja Singh from 'Diya Aur Baati Hum' and Karan Sharma from 'Sasural Simar Ka 2' are all set to tie the knot in March. Their whirlwind romance, spanning just three months, has led to a North Indian-style wedding celebration starting on March 29th and culminating in their marriage on March 30. Despite living in Mumbai and initially planning for an intimate ceremony, their guest list has expanded, showcasing the anticipation and joy surrounding their upcoming nuptials.
data.text:
Synopsis

TV actors Pooja Singh from 'Diya Aur Baati Hum' and Karan Sharma from 'Sasural Simar Ka 2' are all set to tie the knot in March. Their whirlwind romance, spanning just three months, has led to a North Indian-style wedding celebration starting on March 29th and culminating in their marriage on March 30. Despite living in Mumbai and initially planning for an intimate ceremony, their guest list has expanded, showcasing the anticipation and joy surrounding their upcoming nuptials.

Pooja Singh, famed for her role in 'Diya Aur Baati Hum,' and Karan Sharma, known for his portrayal in 'Sasural Simar Ka 2,' are set to tie the knot at the end of March. The couple, who met just three months ago, has swiftly decided to embark on this journey together.

Pooja and Karan's Whirlwind Romance

Their wedding, styled in traditional North Indian fashion, is scheduled for March 30, with festivities commencing on March 29. Pooja shared details of the celebrations with Pinkvilla, stating, "It will be a north-Indian style wedding which will start in the evening, followed by dance, music, and celebration. We will have our haldi and mehndi rituals on the 29th of March which will be a close-knit affair."

Reflecting on their unexpected encounter, Pooja revealed, "It seems quite dreamy as we both belong to the same industry and have been working for almost a decade but have never met." Their paths finally crossed through a mutual acquaintance, leading to what Pooja describes as a destined connection.

Karan Sharma, whose charm has captivated audiences through various TV shows, expressed his excitement about the upcoming wedding. "Yes, I’m getting married by the end of this month," he confirmed. Pooja also delved into their whirlwind romance, mentioning, "After he returned, he was like ‘Let’s get married.’ And from that day, the planning started and it is still happening."

Past Relationships

This will mark Karan Sharma's second marriage, having been previously wed to singer Tia Kar from 2016 to 2019. Similarly, Pooja Singh's earlier marriage was with Kapil Chattani. However, they both embrace their pasts with understanding, as Pooja mentioned, "We have a lot of unsaid understanding and that's what I love about us."

Karan Sharma's notable roles in series such as 'Sasural Simar Ka 2,' 'Udaariyaan,' and 'Mohi,' along with Pooja Singh's contributions in 'Diya Aur Baati Hum,' 'Aye Mere Humsafar,' highlight their extensive experience in the entertainment industry.

As their wedding date approaches, the couple eagerly anticipates celebrating their union amidst the presence of friends from the industry, showcasing a blend of tradition and contemporary joy in their new journey together.
